act.title: Dialog Reconstruction
act.intro: Put the sentences below in the correct order. (They are jumbled randomly and appear in a different order everytime you attemp the activity)

item.hanzi: 您好，我想订两个靠窗的位子，这周六。
item.pinyin: Nín hǎo, wǒ xiǎng dìng liǎng gè kào chuāng de wèizi, zhè zhōu liù.
Duì, wǒmen dàyue qī diǎn dào.
Hǎo de, qǐngwèn xiānsheng guì xìng?

item.hanzi: 好的，李先生，我已经为您订了两个靠窗的位子，这周六
item.pinyin: Hǎo de, Lǐ xiānsheng, wǒ yǐjīng wèi nín dìng le liǎng gè kào chuāng de wèizi, zhè zhōu liù.
